dict.acceptation: 巨人，大汉；巨兽，巨物；卓越人物；

sent.orig: The Giant Card comes with a Giant White Envelope-ready for gift giving or mailing.
sent.trans: The巨卡坚固的重量带有aGiant白色信封为送礼准备或邮寄。

sent.orig: On the shoulders of a giant may see farther than a giant.
sent.trans: 站在巨人的肩膀上，比巨人看得更远。

sent.orig: The giant stood up straight, rubbed his head, and looked at the other giant severely.
sent.trans: 巨人站直身子，揉揉脑袋，恶狠狠地看着另外一个巨人。

sent.orig: Leshan Giant Buddha impartial famous just sit in the Giant Buddha cardiothoracic site.
sent.trans: 著名的乐山大佛不偏不倚正好端坐在巨佛心胸部位。

sent.orig: There is a giant asleep within everyman. When the giant awakens, miracles happen.
sent.trans: 每个人心中都有一个沉睡的巨人，当巨人醒来时奇迹就会发生。
